title: How do I set up my TalkBand B2?
answer:
Perform the following operations to set up your TalkBand B2. For more information, refer to the packaged QSG.

1). Search for the Huawei Wear application in Google Play, the Apple App Store or Huawei App Center, and install the application on your phone.

2). Press and hold the side button on your TalkBand B2 to power it on. When the blinking Bluetooth icon appears, your TalkBand B2 is ready to connect.

3). Enable Bluetooth on your phone and select HUAWEI B2-XXX from the device list.

4). Once the two devices are connected, open the Huawei Wear application and follow the tutorial to enter the home screen of the application. Swipe downwards on the home screen to perform an initial data sync. This will sync settings and other data to your TalkBand B2. When the synchronization is complete, you can start using your TalkBand B2.
